body.p: In April 2010 the Board published an exposure draft Defined Benefit Plans (the 2010 ED). The Board received 227 comment letters in response. In addition to the formal consultation provided by the 2010 ED, the Board undertook an extensive programme of outreach activities during the exposure period with a wide range of users and preparers of financial statements, regulators and others interested in the financial reporting of employee benefits from a wide variety of geographical areas.
